name: Polypharmacy
description:
Help Poly to collect all his books while trying to stay sane.

If you move too much without medicine Poly will go insane which changes the perspective on his world.

Controls: Move with the arrow keys.

Story:  Poly is suffering from the mental illness ADHD.  Therefore he has to take pills to stay focused. Otherwise his mental state becomes unstable - books turn into monsters and the perception of space changes.

(Note: Touching books when Poly isn't sane will kill him)
